  • Classes in imagingbook.lib.image.access used by imagingbook.lib.filter 
    Class Description
    OutOfBoundsStrategy
    Enumeration type representing the available strategies for accessing pixel locations outside the image bounds.
  • Classes in imagingbook.lib.image.access used by imagingbook.lib.filter.linear 
    Class Description
    OutOfBoundsStrategy
    Enumeration type representing the available strategies for accessing pixel locations outside the image bounds.
  • Classes in imagingbook.lib.image.access used by imagingbook.lib.image 
    Class Description
    ImageAccessor
    This abstract class provides unified image access to all 4 types of images available in ImageJ: 8-bit, 16-bit, float, and color images.
    OutOfBoundsStrategy
    Enumeration type representing the available strategies for accessing pixel locations outside the image bounds.
  • Classes in imagingbook.lib.image.access used by imagingbook.lib.image.access 
    Class Description
    GridIndexer2D
    Instances of this class perform the transformation between 2D image coordinates and indexes into the associated 1D pixel array and vice versa.
    GridIndexer2D.OutOfImageException  
    ImageAccessor
    This abstract class provides unified image access to all 4 types of images available in ImageJ: 8-bit, 16-bit, float, and color images.
    OutOfBoundsStrategy
    Enumeration type representing the available strategies for accessing pixel locations outside the image bounds.
    ScalarAccessor
    The common (abstract) super-class for all image accessors to scalar-valued images.
    VectorAccessor
    Accessor for vector-valued images with arbitrary depth (number of components).
  • Classes in imagingbook.lib.image.access used by imagingbook.lib.image.data

    OutOfBoundsStrategy
    Enumeration type representing the available strategies for accessing pixel locations outside the image bounds.
